Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is encrusted with a brown granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of three lines of Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394657) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394657)
